executiveSummary: Jane Wallace and Grace Frost of Psychic Sisters pitched their wellness brand to the Dragons, seeking £50,000 for 5% equity. After receiving multiple offers, they accepted a joint deal from Sara Davies and Deborah Meaden, securing the full investment for a combined 10% stake.
keyDecisions: Jane Wallace and Grace Frost accepted a joint offer from Sara Davies and Deborah Meaden for £50,000 in exchange for 10% equity (5% each).

actionItems.task: Collaborate with Sara Davies and Deborah Meaden to expand Psychic Sisters' brand and retail reach.
Enhance direct-to-consumer sales and social media marketing, especially on TikTok.

nextSteps: Jane and Grace will work with their new investors, Sara Davies and Deborah Meaden, to grow Psychic Sisters' online presence, strengthen its retail strategy, and expand into broader markets.
